de.haukesomm.healthdemo.privacy

Class PrivacyModeAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • de.haukesomm.healthdemo.privacy.PrivacyModeAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class PrivacyModeAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
    Created on 08.03.18

    This adapter takes PrivacyModes and displays them in a list.
